block.p: DONALD J PLINER, New York, named Len Pesko chief operating officer. He had been president at Enzo Angiolini.
MERRILL LYNCH & CO., New York, named Robert J. McCann, senior vice president for its corporate and institutional client group, to the post of chief operating officer for the group.

REFER.COM, Boston, named Paul Pellman chief executive. He was most recently president and chief executive at DriverFX.

WAL-MART STORES, Bentonville, Ark., named Dave Ferguson, who has overseen Wal-Mart's business in Canada, to the post of president and chief executive at its European division. He succeeds Allan Leighton, who is leaving.
